fno: In the cash market, the Nifty 50 added 5.15 points or 0.03% to settle at 18,599. The NSE's India VIX, a gauge of market's expectation of volatility over the near term, advanced 2.17% to 11.38. Infosys, HDFC Bank and Reliance Industries (RIL) were the top traded individual stock futures contracts in F&O segment of NSE. The June 2023 F&O contracts will expire on 29 June 2023.
